response.original_title: 午後の奥様 若妻のおシゴト 超VIPエステ倶楽部
response.overview: Ayaka has started working as an esthetician again, something she did before her marriage, to help her unemployed husband. The salon is rumored to be for VIPs only, and a famous TV presenter and a popular comedian are persistently trying to woo Ayaka. One day, a popular idol, Aiko Tajima, comes to the salon after being introduced by a big-name actor.
response.title: Afternoon Wife: Young Wife's Job at Super VIP Esthetic Club
